entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, a dark wizard. He is described as having followed every word with rapt attention and letting out a cackle of mad laughter.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character who was dying when Snape finished him. He is mentioned as trying to keep the Elder Wand from Voldemort.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A spy who worked against Voldemort and was supposed to be Dumbledore's. He is also described as having a supposed great love for Harry's mother.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist, a boy who is trying to understand the situation.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: A magical object that Voldemort and Harry are fighting over. It is mentioned as being intended for Snape to be the true master of.

relationships.description: Voldemort and Dumbledore were opponents, with Voldemort trying to get the Elder Wand from Dumbledore.
Voldemort and Snape were also opponents, with Voldemort trying to crush Snape's supposed great love.
Dumbledore and Snape were allies, with Dumbledore intending for Snape to be the true master of the Elder Wand.
Voldemort's goal was to get the Elder Wand.
Harry and Voldemort were opponents, with Harry trying to understand the situation and Voldemort trying to crush him.
Snape was intended to be the true master of the Elder Wand.
